white: Spreading misinformation on social media.
Attending a concert before receiving your COVID test results.
Hoarding hydroxychloroquine.
Dobbing in your neighbours to make up for recession losses.
Sticking your supermarket loyalty card to a large knife.
Meditation.
Rubbing your eyes in public because the mask is protecting you.
A pink dinosaur.
Tom Hanks.
Taking advantage of cheap flight prices.
Diamond Princess.
Donald Trump.
Choosing between a slow painful death in isolation, and CoVID.
Turning the world off and on again and hoping the problem goes away.
Listening to actual Infectious Diseases experts.

PPE.

Writing your last will and testament on scrolls of surplus toilet paper.
Making a fake Seniors Card so that you can take advantage of supermarket “Seniors’ Hours”.
Asking catering companies to cook dinner for you.
Comparing mortality rates of other viruses and arguing with others like it’s Holden vs Ford on the Internet, instead of doing something productive.
Injecting disinfectant.

Home delivery services.
Millennials.
Holding parties over video call.
Corona beer.

Having your COVID-19 deck marked as NSFW despite the entire game being NSFW anyway.

Using COVID19 to cover your commitment issues.
Toilet paper.

Aged care facilities.
Using human bodies as Lego pieces.

Intentionally under-testing.

Doctors who have lost their licence.

Rock.

Desperately trying to source hallucinogens to break up the monotony of our new life: being entombed alive between four walls.
Boomers.
Positive thinking.
Social distancing.

Buying so much soap that nobody else can wash their hands properly.
Queen Elizabeth II.
Bathing in essential oils to boost your immune system.

Butter, if only it spread this well.
Psychiatrists.

Downvoting DingTalk to avoid doing homework.
Becoming the warlord of the CoVID ravaged wastelands that were once our society.

Dodgy nightclubs in back alleys.
Deploying epidemiologists to Madagascar to test Plague Inc.'s algorithm.
Being unable to snub someone for the last time by conspicuously skipping their funeral.
An at risk boomer at a cafe proving it's all a hoax.
An insufferable know-it-all with an assured entry place into postgraduate medicine.
Urine.
Protecting yourself with healing crystals.
Schools.

Britain herd-immunitying its way to suicide.
